description:
Professional solution for comparing and syncing database data

dbForge Data Compare for PostgreSQL is a professional tool that automatically compares and syncs the database data on PostgreSQL. It identifies the differences in PostgreSQL tables and reports them in a convenient GUI. After that, the tool issues the data synchronization scripts to update the PostgreSQL table with the new correct data. 

This tool saves a lot of time and effort for the users as it performs the tasks automatedly. You can set them to run on schedule too. With the help of Data Compare for PostgreSQL, users can update the databases in staging/production with the data from the development databases accurately and quickly. The tool also keeps the history of the past database records to ensure data consistency and correctness. 

You can use the fully-functional free trial of the Data Compare tool to evaluate the software functionality.
summary: Professional solution for comparing and syncing PostgreSQL database data
author: Devart
